question: Analyze the social media engagement of tech companies in the healthcare industry for the last year.

subtasks.task: Identify all tech companies operating in the healthcare industry and retrieve their key details such as Name, Id, and Engagement metrics.
Gather social media engagement data focusing on platforms like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube for the identified healthcare tech companies over the last year.
Analyze the engagement metrics (likes, comments, reposts, views) and summarize the findings to determine which companies had the highest engagement rates.
Compile a report that compares the social media presence and engagement of healthcare tech companies, highlighting key strategies and best practices.
